void Text::setStyle ( std::string  style  ) 

Changes font to the given style.

Possible values are: 'normal', 'bold', 'italic', and 'bold italic'.

Warning:
This is not implemented, and does nothing!
void GraphicsObject::undraw (  )  [inherited]

Undraws the object from a graphics window.

This produces an error if the object is not currently drawn.
